Topic.Title: PE of almost 300 and still buyers here .. WOW!

Message.Msg: P/E will go up after they post massive losses next quarter and probably into next year. Cloud computing and Kindle business is crumbling while sales tax will tax a toll on sales. The only real engine Amazon has is 3P and that won't generate the sales they need to hold the stock. Eventually, it will be priced like any other stock with a P/E of under 20. the only question is when.

Message.Title: Time to Sell Amazon Stock
Message.Msg: http://www.smartmoney.com/invest/stocks/are-investors-being-too-patient-with-amazon-1344213671344/?link=SM_hp_ls4e

Message.Title: Common Sense
Message.Msg: You have a choice: A) Buy from Amazon Ship to a locker, pay shipping, wait for delivery, possibly pay sales tax, go pick it up, some hassle to return the item if you decide. B) Buy from a local store Avoid shipping cost, go to a store of your choice WHEN you want to and see and touch the items before buying, pay sales tax, easily return if you change your mind. You decide which is the better choice.
Locker is another scam. Package is limited to about 10 lbs. Still have to spend $ on gas to go to pickup the package. This is no different than requesting in-person pickup at the local UPS office.
Common sense says not to short AMZN, the greatest stock in the Universe.

Message.Title: Sales Tax, Sales Tax, Sales Tax!
Message.Msg: The fifth largest economy in the world, California, is forcing online retailers to collect a 9.75% Sales Tax starting next month. How many Californians, are going to skip AMZN because of this and shop local? This is huge and AMZN knows it. So much so, they have started a "locker" program in the states that are collecting Sales Tax. Oh and don't forget that Pennsylvania is also starting to collect an 8% Sales Tax next month! Ouch!

Message.Title: Amazon's Island
Message.Msg: the company doesn't produce earnings what it does is take a dollar and turn it into a penny. This is accomplished by issuing daily press releases getting them into another dollar bill changer business which no one really understands but will definately produce a penny out of a dollar. Repeat this process daily and we now have a company that can forever go up because there is no way of evaluating it. The promise of future profits due to inovation keeps you on board indefinetly thru the smoke and mirrors business model. The company missed earning by 50 percent projects a next quarter loss and the stock in a shakky market rises 30 bucks from the day before. They are truly in the magic business. All aboard......

PCLN had a nice fall today. This overvalued by any standard will fall big time as well. Question is when I will just keep going out long with a big drop anticipated between now and Jan 14 everyday it goes up the puts get cheaper to accumulate.Amzn I figure can drop all the way to $175 over the next 12-18mos. Maybe even a bigger drop but it will FALL

Topic.Title: Sybil has got the pcln pig covered with a bloody sheet

Message.Msg: Syb, your old pal skiidady from the Chipotle board says hello, and may come over here to chat with you, joined by his little bud.

Topic.Title: Sybil has got the pcln pig covered with a bloody sheet

Message.Msg: Ahead of you on the last part. Already made that switch on all cash... Hold ST TBills with auto roll too... The USD may not be worth much in the future, but all my liabilities are still denominated in 'em...
your 175 target is way off. If turning a dollar into a penny is their future you are looking at 90 bucks in a few months.

Topic.Title: Sybil has got the pcln pig covered with a bloody sheet

Message.Msg: Sybs/tech - Huck knew he'd find you guys here.... PCLN - Wow. What a year, indeed. Huck still kicks self and chides HHFM for only having a small pos. in CMG before the crash but PCLN earnings made Huck's decade. AZO and AMZN are on Huck's radar next. Started sharting AMZN 2 weeks but actually closed out this a.m. for small loss. I could see this bloated bag going a few points higher along with bot-traded DOW to 13.5K before the fall. Watch AZO, fellas. 150 by the end of the year. Negative shareholder equity, -37.00/share book, huge debt used strictly for buyback, tepid growth, used car macro trend theory over-played, analysts one-up'ing each other with upgrades while insiders jumping like Booth at Ford Theatre...... ...all the signs reminiscent of a pre-PCLN/NFLX/CMG nasty fall ahead. Huck ends the day with a Belvedere on ice, and a cheers to you both. H

Topic.Title: Sybil has got the pcln pig covered with a bloody sheet

Message.Msg: Huck: Thanks. I'll check out AZO. It wouldn't have hit my radar because of its relative sane EV/EBITDA. But, looking at the balance sheet, it could be quite vulnerable to sharp decline in consumer purchases...

Topic.Title: AMZN Stocks are tumbling to turn. What is trusting you from picking for?

Message.Msg: there's bulls & there's silly bulls. hope you're correct, but I think that's a little to bullish.
I'm ready to buy them again tomorrow or Thursday. Hopefully around 20 cents.
